page.title: 10EVENTS
page.content: THIS TERM THERE HAVE BEEN SOME SPECIAL EVENTS AT SCHOOL. SOME CHILDREN HAD A SALE TO GET SOME MONEY FOR PEOPLE IN ETHIOPIA WHO HAVE GOT NO FOOD TO EAT.YOU COULD BUY TOYS AND GAMES AND CAKES AND THINGS.WE HAVE ALSO HAD AN OPEN DAY WHEN ALL THE PARENTS COME TO SEE ALL THE WORK YOU HAVE DONE AND SEE YOUR PAINTINGS AND MODELS.WE HAD SPORTS DAY WHERE ALL THE CHILDREN HAVE RACES AND IF YOU COME FIRST OR SECOND YOU WIN A SWEET.WE HAD AMUSICAL EVENING IN THE VILLAGE HALL.WE ALL SANG SONGS AND SOME CHILDREN PLAYED INSTRUMENTS LIKE THE PIANO,RECORDER,AND GUITAR,DRUMS,TAMBOURINES.
